titleStmt.title: Votes concerning the post-master. Also rules of direction for the government of souldiers, made by Captain Dovvet, and delivered to his troopers. With his speech for their observance.
titleStmt.author: Dowet, Captain.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Identified as both Wing E2442 and as Wing V708A.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
